scripts.start: npx concurrently --kill-others --names "Backend,Frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "npm run start-backend" "sleep 3 && npm run start-frontend"
scripts.wait-and-start-frontend: npx wait-on http://localhost:5002 && npm run start-frontend
scripts.dev: npx concurrently --kill-others --names "Backend,Frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "npm run start-backend" "npx wait-on http://localhost:5002 && npm run start-frontend"
